delivery

Class OrdinaryTruck

  • java.lang.Object
    • delivery.Truck
      • delivery.OrdinaryTruck

  • public class OrdinaryTruck
extends Truck
    An extension of the abstract class Truck, OrdinaryTruck implements the abstract methods for Truck. Ordinary Truck can hold stock, and calculates its cost based on the quantity of stock it transports. This class is used to transport goods to the store when they need to be reordered.
    Author:
    Alex Koppon

    • Method Detail

      • getCost

        public double getCost()
        An implementation of the abstract method in Truck. It calculates the cost of the truck using the formula 750 + 0.25*quantity, where quantity is the total quantity of stock stored in the truck. It returns a double.
        Specified by:
        getCost in class Truck
        Returns:
        the double cost. The calculation for this is different for different truck types

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        Returns a string with the type of this truck
        Specified by:
        getType in class Truck
        Returns:
        the String of the truck's type

      • getManifest

        public java.lang.String getManifest()
        Returns a string of the stock and the type of the truck in the format used by Manifest. The format for one item is as follows: ">Ordinay\nitem,quantity\n"
        Specified by:
        getManifest in class Truck
        Returns:
        the a string of the stock contained in a truck in the format used by Manifest. This takes the form >type\nitem,quantity\nitem,quantity\n.."

      • addStock

        public void addStock(Stock stocktoAdd)
              throws DeliveryException
        Adds a new Stock item to the current Stock item. Throws a DeliveryException is the stock exceeds the capacity of the truck or the stock contains refrigerated goods
        Specified by:
        addStock in class Truck
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - if cold stock is added to an OrdinaryTruck

      • getRemainingCapacity

        public int getRemainingCapacity()
        Returns the remaining capacity in the truck, which is the initial capacity minus the total quantity of the stock stored in the truck
        Specified by:
        getRemainingCapacity in class Truck
        Returns:
        the remaining capacity in a truck i.e(capacity-totalStockQuantity)
